bug.author: easysoft2k15
bug.summary: Unable to register into the Pyro forum
bug.description:
I tried many time to register into the pyro forum: [https://forum.pyro.ai] The site keep telling me that I'll receive a confirmation email but I never got one. I request the email many time, I tried to change email address, I check spam message but nothing worked. I'v also tried to register with github but I get an error:
Sorry, there was an error authorizing your account. Perhaps you did not approve authorization?
Doing it from a cookie clean browser make it ask for a password but it then return a similar error. Can somebody please help? Thank You

comments.comment: Not sure if this is a recent issue, but another user on the <denchmark-link:https://forum.pyro.ai/t/svi-for-classification/324>forum</denchmark-link> mentioned about github authentication not working.
This morning i retry the "Resend email" link and it worked! Not sure if this was a bug or a temporary problem. In any case I guess You can now close the issue. Thank You
Discourse can be a little finicky sometimes, especially with SSO. Closing as resolved.
